ygData.subject: Looking for Banded in Neriak/Freeport area - Tarew Marr server
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, guess the subject says it all.  I am looking to purchase banded (I think 11 pcs for a full suit).  I guess the other question is how much?  I will admit
ygData.messageBody:
Well, guess the subject says it all. I am looking to purchase banded (I
think 11 pcs for a full suit). I guess the other question is how much? I
will admit I don't have the money right now but thought I should find the
supplier now. Tunic will most likely be the first thing I purchase (if I
don't do the purchase in one bulk purchase, in this case it will be a
while). Size small (Dark Elf).

Wasn't sure where else to post this.

Tenin
